name: Ghost Boi (theBalance)
description:
There's no easy way to say this. You're dead. But hey, that doesn't mean we can't have a bit of fun with the mouth breathers that still live around here. Time for a new adventure.

This game is a 2D top down adventure in a Zelda-like style. Scare the willies out of the local villagers and watch out for other monsters that roam the land.

This game was created for the Gamedev.tv Game Jam 2022. Full source code is available on Github. https://github.com/theBalanceAU/Ghost-Game

Controls:

Keyboard

[W/A/S/D] : Movement

[E] : Interact / Throw

[F] : Scare

[ESC] : Pause

Gamepad:

[Left Stick / D-PAD] : Movement

[A] : Scare

[X] : Interact/Throw

[Start] : Pause
